name: Theseus
storyline:
The year is 2063. 
Zion, the once prominent metropolis, was the epicenter for cybernetics enhancement... 
The curtain is raised for a new age of Chaos... 
Amidst desperation and disarray, the profession of "Bounty Hunter" rises in demand.
summary:
Code: T is a mobile simulation game revealed by Netease Games at their 6th annual product launch event in May 2020. 
 
From the cinematic announcement trailer it is clearly based on Cyberpunk 2077.

videos.name: Announcement Trailer
videos.title: NetEase Games Sixth Annual Product Launch Event - Code T
